list.title: The Meeting House Audiocast
list.text: Join us each week for The Meeting House AudioCast where we explore what it means to be a Christ Follower. Listen to the message online or subscribe using through our RSS feed or ITunes.
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: The After Party
list.text: Taking Sunday messages and concepts into extended conversations.
list.imageAlt: Young woman sitting at a table and looking at her notes from Sunday teaching at The Meeting House.

list.title: The Meeting House Roundtable
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: The Meeting House VideoCast
list.text: Join us each week for The Meeting House VideoCast where we explore what it means to be a Christ Follower. Watch the message here online, subscribe through our RSS feed and ITunes Podcast, or visit our Youtube channel for more recent messages...
list.imageAlt: Production volunteer recording a Meeting House video.
